# subtype

**Instance Property**

Returns the subtype of the event.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var subtype: UIEvent.EventSubtype { get }
```

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIEvent/EventSubtype] constant returned by this property indicates the subtype of the event in relation to the general type, which you can retrieve from the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIEvent/type] property.

## Getting the event type

- **type**: Returns the type of the event.
- **UIEvent.EventType**: Constants that specify the general type of an event.
- **UIEvent.EventSubtype**: Constants that specify the subtype of the event in relation to its general type.
